About us

We are a community of former professional athletes empowering student athletes and parents design their playbook for success in sports and life.

Join the athletes council

Our mission

The Athletes Council exists to build, grow and sustain long-term relationships between a global community of student athletes connected to a community of former professional athletes who are dedicated to ensuring the next generation’s success in sports and life.

A Letter from the CEO

Hall of Fame

The Council Team Leaders

James Donaldson,

CEO

Over a 25-year career, John Stone has been a leader in educational reform, sports media and marketing. Early in his career, John taught middle school social studies in some of Houston’s most challenging schools working as a member of Teach for America. Following a master’s degree at Columbia Teachers College, John earned a joint MBA/MS in business and communications that led him to leadership positions in marketing and media over the past 15 years. \u2028 In 2003, John won an Emmy Award for his work on the HBO documentary, \u2028Curse of the Bambino. He has also been a key member of teams launching new programming at ESPN and new networks such as the Fox Business Network in 2007. As Director of New Business Development for the New England Consulting Group in 2010, he led the firm into new sectors like education, entertainment \u2028and sports.

James Donaldson,

CEO

Over a 25-year career, John Stone has been a leader in educational reform, sports media and marketing. Subscribe to The Athletes Council

All for only

$4.99 / mo

Subscribe

  • Unlock the keys and get full access to The Athletes Council in-depth value-added content (offered only through our playbook areas)

  • Connect with a community of elite athletes and proven winners

  • Learn valuable insights directly from The Athletes Council members

  • Earn rewards for high achievement in sports, school and community leadership

  • Earn discounts to use at The Athletes Council Store and offline events

  • Become part of a growing community and customize your own “playbook” page

  • Gain access to membership and join The Athletes Council team (for subscribers only)
